actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Designating the Ulysses S. Grant Association as the organization to implement the bicentennial celebration of the birth of Ulysses S. Grant, Civil War General and 2-term President of the United States.
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text:
Expresses support for the bicentennial celebration of the birth of Ulysses S. Grant.  

Designates the Ulysses S. Grant Association, housed at the Ulysses S. Grant Presidential Library at Mississippi State University, as the designated institution for organizing and leading the celebration of the bicentennial.

titles.title: Designating the Ulysses S. Grant Association as the organization to implement the bicentennial celebration of the birth of Ulysses S. Grant, Civil War General and 2-term President of the United States.
